summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeYour lips have never tasted so sweet with the Lanolips Glazed Donut 101 Ointment Multi-Balm. The iconic Lanolips Original 101 Ointment has been sugar-coated, creating a hydrating sweet treat for your lips.
details: DetailsBenefitsThis super rich, 100% natural lip balm penetrates and seals in moisture to give extreme hydration for extremely dry and chapped lips.As its name suggests, it has many uses beyond just lips.101 Uses include: Apply to dry cuticles/cracked heels/dry nasal passages. Melt it into your own moisturizer to supercharge. Mix a tiny bit with your foundation for a natural, dewy look. Keep eyebrows in place. Apply to windburn/cold-chapped cheeks. Heal dry/brittle nails, paper cuts, insect bites.Alleviates dryness associated with psoriasis and eczema.FeaturesFemale-Owned Beauty BrandNew Mom Friendly - Safe enough for newborn babiesTSA-Approved, travel friendly beauty productDermatologically TestedCruelty-FreeCertified by Leaping BunnyVegetarian100% NaturalFormulated WithoutArtificial ColorsParabensPetrolatumPEGsMineral OilItem 2621683How To UseWarm the ointment between the fingers or apply directly onto the lips & skin. Use generously.For external use only.IngredientsLanolin*, flavour (nat)*, tocopheryl acetate* *naturally derived/*dÃ©rivÃ© naturelle.
how_to_use: Warm the ointment between the fingers or apply directly onto the lips & skin. Use generously.For external use only.

reviews.headline: Such a life-saver in the winter!
reviews.comments: My lips get chapped and dry so quickly, especially with the weather getting colder. A salesperson recommended this to me in-store and it's such a wonderful little tube of joy. It smells exactly like a donut and it keeps my lips so soft and protected. It's very thick and a little goes a long way. It's a very pale brown and appears clear/shiny when on my lips.

reviews.headline: can't get enough
reviews.comments: I have 2 minis and the full size of this bc it's by far one of my favorites. It smells like maple syrup and lasts sooo long. it's thick and holds on the lips. the lanolin makes the formula amazing and so healing!

reviews.headline: Ew
reviews.comments: Just bought this from the store and as soon as I got out I was putting it on and this oily ooze was coming out. Pure liquid and not thick.

reviews.headline: OMG SO GOOD
reviews.comments: smalls HEAVENLY! i use it for dry lips and my dry nose! you know when you get sick and you use too many tissues and it makes you nose sore and dry? well that's what i use it for and it works really well and smells so so good.

reviews.headline: Spread it on and feel the magic
reviews.comments: The product is thick and a bit hard to spread, but once you get it it smells and tastes so good and works like magic.

reviews.headline: IHOP!
reviews.comments: I just got this in a bag of samples and am immediately adding the full size to my cart. I second the reviewer who clocked the scent as artificial maple syrup - not donuts at all, but it smells EXACTLY like you're at ihop pouring syrup on a warm fluffy stack of pancakes. It's delicious, and also really soothing on my super chapped lips.

reviews.headline: Love Lanolips!
reviews.comments: I love the original lanolips but wanted something that didn't require me to use my fingers and this is perfect! It's just like the original, thick and hydrating, plus a lip applicator and delicious scents. My only complaint is how big the hole in the lip applicator is. I still can't wait to try them all!

reviews.headline: The Best Lip Balm
reviews.comments: Lanolips has been the best lip balm I've tried. I have chronically dry and flaky lips, and this really helps keep them smooth and healthy. Most lip balms have done little to help, but applying this once a day before bed keeps my lips smooth and soft throughout the day. I also keep it on hand throughout the day because I enjoy the feeling of it and the fun scents (glazed donut is my favorite right now because it is a sweet and cozy scent!). It isn't overly sticky, which is important to me since I have long hair and it gets stuck on my lips if I wear anything too sticky.

reviews.headline: Love it!!!
reviews.comments: So hydrating and feels amazing on my lips!

reviews.headline: This lip product is soooo good
reviews.comments: So hydrating for your lips.

reviews.headline: holy grail
reviews.comments: I was off put by the overwhelmimg smell of donuts on my lips but then quickly fell in love. I've tried pretty much 80% of this brand's products and this is by far my favorite besdies the original lanolip. Very hydrating and gives you that gloss like look.

reviews.headline: love it
reviews.comments: amazing

reviews.headline: Artificial maple syrup miracle worker!
reviews.comments: This is a miracle lip balm. My lips were in rough shape when I was dehydrated, and got windburned lips from being in the middle of Wisconsin winter. My lips felt so nice when I applied this. By the next morning I noticed a significant difference in my lips. I truly could not beliefe it. I don't notice any difference on the skin, other than your skin is sticky, so I'm not sure what else to use it for other than lip balm. You don't need a lot, and it works best when you apply it with your finger. It's thick at first (main reason you don't need a lot) but, as it warms up and you run your finger back and forth a little bit, or just rub your lips together for a little bit, it thins out. So I guess you could say there's sort of a learning curve with it, but it is SO worth it! It has a shiny finish (wet/gloss shiny not shimmer shiny). The scent is fairly noticable and slightly tastes how it smells, which is artificial maple syrup. I personally love the scent, so I will definitely repurchase. Highly recommend, if you like that artificial maple syrup scent, though, as it does tend to linger for a good bit.

reviews.headline: Smells so good
reviews.comments: Really my favorite lip product, ive gotten so many people to buy this after they tried mine.

reviews.headline: Actually Heals Lips
reviews.comments: This is my first Lanolips purchase. It's an amazing lip balm and heals dry (winter) lips like no other. Other lip balms just seem to coat the skin without actual nourishment. The scent is cute but very strong, like pancakes or something. I am excited to try more scents/flavors.

reviews.headline: I would buy this againnn
reviews.comments: very smooth

reviews.headline: Gross smell
reviews.comments: I normally love lanolips, but the smell and taste of this is absolutely rancid. Had to return her ðŸ’”

reviews.headline: i like!
reviews.comments: would love a summer fridays type aplicator with this formula but i would repurchase

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: This ointment is great for repairing my lips during winter. I have tried so many lip balms and masks and this one has worked best this season.

reviews.headline: I love all the clear lanolips multi-balms...
reviews.comments: I have very dry lips, sensitive skin and I live in a desert climate, so I always have one in my purse. I absolutely love coconut and strawberry, and this flavor is a new love, which smells like a maple-glazed donut. I would def buy it again.

faceoff_positive.comments: This is a miracle lip balm. My lips were in rough shape when I was dehydrated, and got windburned lips from being in the middle of Wisconsin winter. My lips felt so nice when I applied this. By the next morning I noticed a significant difference in my lips. I truly could not beliefe it. I don't notice any difference on the skin, other than your skin is sticky, so I'm not sure what else to use it for other than lip balm. You don't need a lot, and it works best when you apply it with your finger. It's thick at first (main reason you don't need a lot) but, as it warms up and you run your finger back and forth a little bit, or just rub your lips together for a little bit, it thins out. So I guess you could say there's sort of a learning curve with it, but it is SO worth it! It has a shiny finish (wet/gloss shiny not shimmer shiny). The scent is fairly noticable and slightly tastes how it smells, which is artificial maple syrup. I personally love the scent, so I will definitely repurchase. Highly recommend, if you like that artificial maple syrup scent, though, as it does tend to linger for a good bit.
faceoff_positive.headline: Artificial maple syrup miracle worker!

faceoff_negative.comments: I bought this after hearing great things & I so badly wanted to love it. I love a thicker gloss before bed to moisturize my lips overnight, but this just wasnt it unfortunately. I wore it out & the product turned WHITE on my lips. I thought maybe it interacted with something I wasnt sure. I tried it again later that night directly following my shower / skin care and it again after wearing it for 5-10 minutes gave a super white tint to my lips. I didnt mind the smell, but I do agree it was very heavy on the maple.  Sadly, will be returning this product.
faceoff_negative.headline: I want to love it
